amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part C of House Report 116-51 to increase the Federal Highway Administration Emergency Relief Program by $500 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Axne amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mrs. Axne.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Axne amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
